Your Multidisciplinary Roles

Creative Neurotech Alchemist

Building immersive VR/AR experiences for surgical training, patient therapy, and medical education using cutting-edge game development techniques.

Innovation Projects

NeuroArt BCI Gallery

An interactive exhibition where visitors' brainwaves generate unique digital artworks in real-time through EEG headsets and generative AI algorithms.

BioSync Wearables

Smart wearables that monitor multiple biomarkers and translate health data into personalized digital art experiences for therapeutic purposes.

Organ Digital Twins

Creating interactive 3D models of human organs using medical imaging data for surgical planning, medical education, and patient communication.
